title: Prison Mike's Insight
content: I am here to scare you straight! I'm here to tell you that the inside of this room is way worse than out there in the real world.
author: Michael Scott

title: Threat Level Midnight
content: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take. Wayne Gretzky — Michael Scott
author: Michael Scott

title: Jim's Prank
content: Bears. Beets. Battlestar Galactica.
author: Jim Halpert

title: Pam's Thoughts
content: I don't care what they say about me. I just want to eat.
author: Pam Beesly

title: Dwight's Sales Pitch
content: Would I ever leave this company? Look, I'm all about loyalty. In fact, I feel like, part of what I love about Dunder Mifflin is the tight bond we share as a team. And the fact that I'm able to save them, and grow my own career while I'm at it.
author: Dwight Schrute

title: Kelly's Gossip
content: You know what they say: An eye for an eye leaves the whole world blind. No, I'm just kidding. I would beat the crap out of someone for you.
author: Kelly Kapoor

title: Stanley's Wisdom
content: Did I stutter?
author: Stanley Hudson

title: Kevin's Logic
content: Why waste time say lot word when few word do trick?
author: Kevin Malone

title: Angela's Cat Tale
content: I have a cat. His name is Sprinkles, but I never said he was a regular cat.
author: Angela Martin

title: Phyllis' Observations
content: Close your mouth, sweetie. You look like a trout.
author: Phyllis Vance

title: Toby's Silence
content: Why are you the way that you are?
author: Toby Flenderson

title: Ryan's Motivation
content: I just want to lie on the beach and eat hot dogs. That's all Ive ever wanted.
author: Ryan Howard

title: Meredith's Bold Statement
content: Ain't no party like a Scranton party 'cause a Scranton party don't stop!
author: Meredith Palmer

title: Oscar's Facts
content: You're dressed like this in public and you're worried about MY pride?
author: Oscar Martinez

title: Creed's Confusion
content: If I can't scuba, then what's this all been about?
author: Creed Bratton

title: Andy Bernard's Wish
content: I wish there was a way to know you're in the good old days before you've actually left them.
author: Andy Bernard

title: Darryl's Plan
content: I hate when people just quote the dictionary.
author: Darryl Philbin

title: Michael's Love
content: I knew exactly what to do. But in a much more real sense, I had no idea what to do.
author: Michael Scott

title: Pam's Aspiration
content: I'm not usually the butt of the joke. I'm usually the face of the joke.
author: Pam Beesly

title: Jim's Sardonic Humor
content: Right now, this is just a job. If I advance any higher in this company, then this is my career. And if this were my career, I’d have to throw myself in front of a train.
author: Jim Halpert
